did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: American Collegiate Schools of Architecture Publication, 1990

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the American Collegiate Schools of Architecture Publication must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: American Collegiate Schools of Architecture Publication, Ms2001-058, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The American Collegiate Schools of Architecture Publication was donated in 2000.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The American Collegiate Schools of Architecture Publication was added to the IAWA Small Collections Ms2009-054 in September 2009.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: The American Collegiate Schools of Architecture is an organization of 150 accredited architecture schools to help with the advancement of architectural education.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of the 1990 publication Status of Faculty Women in Architecture Schools developed by the Association of Collegiate Schools of Architecture's Task Force on the Status of Women in Architecture Schools. The report (32 pages) is based on a survey distributed to faculty women and school administrators and published in 1990. [Another copy is available in the Art and Architecture Library: LB2332.3 S82 1990.]
